## How Lando Norris Plans to Defend His F1 Title
Lando Norris, the current F1 champion, has expressed his determination to defend his title in the upcoming season. In a recent interview, Norris stated that he has a different mentality to Max Verstappen, his closest competitor. This mentality, he believes, will give him an edge over his rivals and help him retain his title.

## Unpacking the New F1 Rules with Lando Norris
The new F1 rules are set to bring more chaos to the races, according to Norris. The rules, which aim to improve the overall racing experience, will introduce new challenges for the drivers. Norris, however, is confident that his experience and skills will allow him to adapt to the new rules and come out on top. The table below highlights the key changes to the F1 rules:

| Rule Change | Description |
| --- | --- |
| New Tire Compound | Softer tire compound to improve grip and handling |
| Revised Aerodynamics | Changes to the car's aerodynamics to reduce downforce and improve overtaking |
| Increased Fuel Flow | Increased fuel flow to improve engine performance |
| New Safety Features | Improved safety features, including enhanced crash protection and better helmet design |

## What Lando Norris and George Russell Said About the Upcoming Season
Lando Norris and George Russell, two of the top F1 drivers, have been engaging in a war of words ahead of the new season. Norris, who is confident of defending his title, stated that he has a different mentality to Max Verstappen. Russell, on the other hand, is eager to take Norris' title and has been practicing padel with him to get an edge. The quotes below highlight their mindset and goals for the upcoming season:

* "I think I just have more confidence" - Lando Norris
* "I'm giddy about taking his title" - George Russell

## Frequently Asked Questions
Q: Who is the current F1 champion?
A: Lando Norris is the current F1 champion.
Q: What are the new F1 rules?
A: The new F1 rules include a softer tire compound, revised aerodynamics, increased fuel flow, and new safety features.
Q: Who is Lando Norris' closest competitor?
A: Max Verstappen is Lando Norris' closest competitor.
Q: What is George Russell's goal for the upcoming season?
A: George Russell's goal is to take Lando Norris' title.
